actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty free treatment to watches manufactured in any insular possession of the United Stated if foreign materials do not exceed 70 percent of the total value of such watches.

summary.text: Provides, under the Tariff Schedules of the United States, for duty free treatment of watches manufactured in any insular possession of the United States if foreign materials do not exceed 70 percent of the total value of such watches.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty free treatment to watches manufactured in any insular possession of the United Stated if foreign materials do not exceed 70 percent of the total value of such watches.
